body.p: 1. One of King David’s sons, born in Jerusalem (2 Sm 5:16; 1 Chr 3:8). He is also called Beeliada in 1 Chronicles 14:7.
2. Father of Rezon, the king of Damascus and an adversary of Solomon (1 Kgs 11:23).
3. General under King Jehoshaphat. Eliada and the 200,000 warriors he commanded were from Benjamin’s tribe (2 Chr 17:17).
